reference.title: Components of a Smith Corona Holiday Case
reference.shortdesc: The Smith Corona Holiday Case is one of the most popular and common portable typewriter cases. The Holiday Case has multiple mechanisms that are important to know for long-term typewriter maintenance and use.

dlentry.dd: Metal frame attached to the bottom of the Holiday Case, holding the typewriter in place.
Two triangular components at the end of the fastening frame, settling in the rear retainer slots.
A small lever at the bottom left-hand side of the fastening frame.
Spring-loaded levers near each hinge, unhooking the hinges when pressed for case lid removal.
A small lever denoted by a white arrow on the left-hand side of the bottom of the Holiday Case.
Two metal slots located near the back of the bottom half of the Holiday Case.
